original_title: Devolver MaxPass+ Showcase | Monetization as a Service
overview: A continuation of the Devolver Digital Big Fancy Press Conferences and Devolver Direct. Centering around a new games as service model.
tagline: Enjoy these Premium Purchases as a part of your Devolver MaxPass+ subscription that you already signed up for but didn't know it.
title: Devolver MaxPass+ Showcase | Monetization as a Service
